entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove the Blazor survey link from the project templates #45854
  • WebEventData.ParseEventArgsJson has invalid UnconditionalSuppressMessage for JsonSerializer.Deserialize #45851
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #45848
  • Log message on logout success incorrectly states "Login completed successfully." (Blazor WASM) #45846
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • 3rd party notices link does not work #45745
    7.0.x
  • Skipped test WasmPublishIntegrationTest.Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works #39289
    8.0-MQ
  • Hg #45850
  • Transient local build failures: error MSB3491: Could not write lines to file #45596
  • custom elements doesn't work on any page except index.cshtml when hosting blazor components in razor pages #45818
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets` has a check for .NET6 so it fails on .NET7 #45849
  • Provide input arguments when calling OnParametersSet(Async) method #45516
    Discussions
  • Allow setting Content-Disposition to inline from Results.File and Results.Stream #45844
  • [docs] BuildFromSource.md - busted anchor link and incorrect step numbering #45839

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #45857
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #45856
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • Updated the Third Party Notices for 8.0 project templates #45853
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Backport deletion of playwright tests #45852
    6.0.x
  • Fix logout success log message (Blazor WebAssembly) #45847
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add Tags property to OutputCache property. #45843
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [AOT] Add RequiresDynamicCode annotation to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing #45580
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
    8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `516940f` to `71140c3` #45764
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Quarantine Settings_MaxHeaderListSize_Server #45812
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [docs] BuildFromSource.md fixes + edit pass #45828
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix gRPC template tests #45702
    area-mvc, area-grpc
  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45538
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm] unify startup bit more #45628
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 8.0
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Update Helix.Common.props #45772
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2078080 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix inconsistent casing of template parameters #45816
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
